Drivers

Learn about the 20 drivers competing in the 2021 Formula 1 championship including Lewis Hamilton, the defending World Drivers' Champion, who is looking to win his 7th championship this year.

Teams

Find out more about the 10 teams competing for the World Constructors' Championship. Mercedes are the reigning champions, and they face fierce competition from the likes of Ferrari and Red Bull.
